snippet: Square, the rising mobile payments company, has received a $25 million investment from Starbucks, reports Claire Cain Miller of The New York Times. Howard D. Schultz, Starbucks's chief executive and a former Groupon board member, will join Square's...
abstract: Square, the rising mobile payments company, has received a $25 million investment from Starbucks, reports Claire Cain Miller of The New York Times. Howard D. Schultz, Starbucks's chief executive and a former Groupon board member, will join Square's board.

headline.main: Starbucks Invests $25 Million in Square; Schultz Joins Board
